member.name: T:Microsoft.Research.DynamicDataDisplay.BingMapsPlot
member.summary: Control for plotting data in geographical coordinates over Bing Maps. This control should be put into Children collection of Bing Maps MapControl. Plot coordinates (x,y) are treated as longitude and latitude.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Research.DynamicDataDisplay.BingMapsPlot.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of class. Assigns instance of to property.
